texts.text: Anna is going on a picnic with her friends. She is bringing sandwiches, fruit, and juice. They will play games and enjoy the sunny weather. What will they do at the picnic?
Jake is going camping in the mountains. He will sleep in a tent and cook food over a fire. He will also go hiking and fishing. What will Jake do on his camping trip?
options: C) Cook food over a fire
texts.correct_answer: C) Cook food over a fire

texts.text: Lucy is visiting her grandparents' farm. She helps feed the chickens and collect eggs. Then, she picks fresh vegetables from the garden for dinner. What does Lucy do on the farm?
options: C) Feed chickens and collect eggs
texts.correct_answer: C) Feed chickens and collect eggs

texts.text: Tom is at the beach with his family. He builds a sandcastle and swims in the ocean. Later, they have a picnic on the sand. What did Tom do at the beach?
Emily is at the zoo with her class. They see lions, elephants, and monkeys. They also learn about different animals from the zookeeper. What did Emily do at the zoo?
